fields.description:
1) I have installed appcelerator studio (Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.5.0.201602170821) Latest version from the website
2) Appelerator studio -> Help -> install Appcelerator SDK -> install from update stream (5.2.2 GA)
3) Issue
'Installing Titanium SDK has encountered a problem. This status has children statuses. See 'details' for more information
<<details section>>
java.net.SocketTimeoutException: Read timed out
java.net.SocketTimeoutException: Read timed out
Read timed out

Issue#2 : Alternatively, I tried giving the url with
http://builds.appcelerator.com/mobile-releases/5.2.2/mobilesdk-5.2.2.GA-osx.zip ,It doesnt work.

Issue#3: Alternatively, i also tried it in CLI,by running appc ti sdk install
New version available! 5.2.2.GA
Downloading http://builds.appcelerator.com/mobile-releases/5.2.2/mobilesdk-5.2.2.GA-osx.zip
   32% [=============...........................] 976.1s 
Stuck at 32% doesnt work.
fields.summary: Unable to install Appcelerator SDK - Error
